00093 void RooSmearer::SetCache(Long64_t nEvents, bool cacheToy, bool externToy){
00094   std::cout << "------------------------------------------------------------" << std::endl;
00095   std::cout << "[STATUS] Importing cache events" << std::endl;
00096 
00097   if(data_events_cache.empty()){
00098     if(cacheToy){
00099       std::cout << "[STATUS] --- Setting toy cache for data" << std::endl;
00100       data_events_cache = importer.GetCache(_signal_chain, false, false, nEvents, true, externToy); //importer.GetCacheToy(nEvents, false);
00101     }else {
00102       std::cout << "[STATUS] --- Setting cache for data" << std::endl;
00103       data_events_cache = importer.GetCache(_data_chain, false, false, nEvents);
00104     }
00105   }
00106   if(!mc_events_cache.empty()){
00107     std::cerr << "[ERROR] mc_events_cache not empty: " << mc_events_cache.size() << std::endl;
00108     exit(1);
00109   }
00110   if(mc_events_cache.empty()){
00111     if(cacheToy){
00112       std::cout << "[STATUS] --- Setting toy cache for mc" << std::endl;
00113       mc_events_cache = importer.GetCache(_signal_chain, true, false, nEvents,true, externToy); //importer.GetCacheToy(nEvents, true);
00114     }else {
00115       std::cout << "[STATUS] --- Setting cache for mc" << std::endl;
00116       mc_events_cache = importer.GetCache(_signal_chain, true, false, nEvents);
00117     }
00118   }
00119 
00120 
00121 #ifdef DEBUG
00122   std::cout << "[DEBUG] Data events size:" << data_events_cache.size() << std::endl;
00123   std::cout << "[DEBUG] MC events size:" << data_events_cache.size() << std::endl;
00124 #endif
00125 
00126   return;
00127 }

00129 void RooSmearer::InitCategories(bool mcToy){
00130 
00131   int index=0;
00132   ZeeCategories.reserve((int)(importer._regionList.size()*(importer._regionList.size()+1)/2 +1));
00133   for(std::vector<TString>::const_iterator region_ele1_itr = importer._regionList.begin();
00134       region_ele1_itr != importer._regionList.end();
00135       region_ele1_itr++){
00136     for(std::vector<TString>::const_iterator region_ele2_itr = region_ele1_itr; //importer._regionList.begin();
00137         region_ele2_itr != importer._regionList.end();
00138         region_ele2_itr++){
00139 #ifdef DEBUG
00140       std::cout << "==============================" << std::endl;
00141 #endif
00142       ZeeCategory cat;
00143       cat.categoryIndex1 = region_ele1_itr - importer._regionList.begin();
00144       cat.categoryIndex2 = region_ele2_itr - importer._regionList.begin();
00145 
00146 //       if(!mcToy) cat.data_events = &(data_events_cache[index]);
00147 //       else {
00148 //      std::cout << "[INFO] Initializing data_events with mc" << std::endl;
00149 //      cat.data_events = &(mc_events_cache[index]);
00150 //       }
00151       cat.data_events = &(data_events_cache[index]);
00152       cat.mc_events = &(mc_events_cache[index]);
00153       
00154       cat.categoryName1 += *region_ele1_itr;
00155       cat.categoryName2 += *region_ele2_itr;
00156 
00157       cat.pars1.add(_params_vec[cat.categoryIndex1]);
00158       cat.pars2.add(_params_vec[cat.categoryIndex2]);
00159 
00160       cat.scale1=1;
00161       cat.alpha1=0;
00162       cat.constant1=0;
00163       cat.scale2=1;
00164       cat.alpha2=0;
00165       cat.constant2=0;
00166 
00167 //       RooArgList argList1(cat.pars1);
00168 //       TIterator *it = argList1.createIterator();
00169 //       for(RooRealVar *v = (RooRealVar *) it->Next(); v!=NULL; v = (RooRealVar*) it->Next())
00170 //      cat.pars1_old.add( *((RooRealVar*) v->Clone(TString(v->GetName())+"_old")));
00171 //       RooArgList argList2(cat.pars2);
00172 //       it = argList2.createIterator();
00173 //       for(RooRealVar *v = (RooRealVar *) it->Next(); v!=NULL; v = (RooRealVar*) it->Next())
00174 //      cat.pars2_old.add( *((RooRealVar*) v->Clone(TString(v->GetName())+"_old")));
00175       
00176 
00177       cat.nBins=nBins_;
00178       cat.invMass_min=invMass_min_;
00179       cat.invMass_max=invMass_max_;
00180       
00181 #ifdef DEBUG
00182       std::cout << "[DEBUG] Cat ele1: " << cat.categoryName1 << "\t" << cat.categoryIndex1 << std::endl;
00183       cat.pars1.Print();
00184       std::cout << "[DEBUG] Cat ele2: " << cat.categoryName2 << "\t" << cat.categoryIndex2 << std::endl;
00185       cat.pars2.Print();
00186 
00187       //cat.data_events->size();
00188 #endif
00189 
00190       // allocating the histograms
00191       TString histoName;
00192       histoName= cat.categoryName1+cat.categoryName2+"_";
00193 
00194       cat.hist_mc=new TH1F(histoName+"MC", histoName+"MC", cat.nBins, cat.invMass_min, cat.invMass_max);
00195       cat.hist_mc->Sumw2();
00196       cat.smearHist_mc=new TH1F(histoName+"smearMC", histoName+"smearMC", cat.nBins, cat.invMass_min, cat.invMass_max);
00197       cat.smearHist_mc->Sumw2();
00198       cat.hist_data=new TH1F(histoName+"data", histoName+"data", cat.nBins, cat.invMass_min, cat.invMass_max);
00199       cat.hist_data->Sumw2();
00200       cat.smearHist_data=new TH1F(histoName+"smeardata", histoName+"smeardata", cat.nBins, cat.invMass_min, cat.invMass_max);
00201       cat.smearHist_data->Sumw2();
00202       SetHisto(*(cat.mc_events), cat.hist_mc);
00203 
00204       //------------------------------ deactivating category
00205       cat.active=true;
00206       unsigned int deactiveMinEvents = 1000; //_deactive_minEventsDiag;
00207       if(cat.categoryIndex1 != cat.categoryIndex2) // not diagonal category
00208         deactiveMinEvents=2000; //_deactive_minEventsOffDiag;
00209       if(cat.hist_mc->Integral() < deactiveMinEvents){
00210         std::cout << "[INFO] Category: " << ZeeCategories.size() 
00211                   << ": " << cat.categoryName1 << "\t" << cat.categoryName2
00212                   << " has been deactivated (nEvents < "; 
00213         if(cat.categoryIndex1 != cat.categoryIndex2) std::cout << _deactive_minEventsOffDiag << ")";
00214         else std::cout << _deactive_minEventsDiag << ")";
00215         std::cout << " nEvents mc invMass: " << cat.hist_mc->Integral()
00216                   << std::endl;
00217         cat.active=false;
00218       }     
00219       float max=cat.hist_mc->GetMaximum();
00220       float left=cat.hist_mc->GetBinContent(1);
00221       float right=cat.hist_mc->GetBinContent(cat.hist_mc->GetNbinsX());
00222       if((right - left)/max > 0.2 || (left - right)/max > 0.4){
00223         cat.active=false;
00224         std::cout << "[INFO] Category: " << ZeeCategories.size() 
00225                   << ": " << cat.categoryName1 << "\t" << cat.categoryName2
00226                   << " has been deactivated for high sholder: " << right << " " << left << " " << max 
00227                   << std::endl;
00228       }
00229       //------------------------------ 
00230       if (_autoBin){
00231         //SetAutoBin(cat,cat.invMass_min-20,cat.invMass_max+20); 
00232         AutoNBins(cat);
00233         SetHisto(*(cat.mc_events), cat.hist_mc);
00234         SetHisto(*(cat.data_events), cat.hist_data);
00235       }
00236       cat.nSmearToy=_nSmearToy;
00237       if(smearscan || (cat.active && _autoNsmear)) AutoNSmear(cat);
00238       
00239 
00240 
00241       cat.nLLtoy=1;
00242       cat.nll=0;
00243       std::cout << "[INFO] Category: " << ZeeCategories.size() 
00244                 << "\t" << cat.categoryName1 << "\t" << cat.categoryName2
00245                 << "\t" << cat.categoryIndex1 << "\t" << cat.categoryIndex2
00246                 << "\t" << cat.nSmearToy 
00247                 << "\t" << cat.nLLtoy
00248                 << "\t" << cat.nBins 
00249                 << "\t" << cat.mc_events->size() 
00250                 << "\t" << cat.data_events->size()
00251                 << "\t" << cat.hist_mc->Integral()
00252                 << "\t" << cat.hist_data->Integral()
00253                 << "\t" << cat.active
00254                 << "\t" << right
00255                 << "\t" << left
00256                 << "\t" << max
00257                 << std::endl;
00258 
00259       ZeeCategories.push_back(cat);      
00260       
00261       index++;
00262     }       
00263   }
00264 
00265 }

00267 
00268 TH1F *RooSmearer::GetSmearedHisto(ZeeCategory& category, bool isMC,
00269                                   bool smearEnergy, bool forceNew, bool multiSmearToy){
00270 
00271 // #ifdef MEM_DEBUG
00272 //   ProcInfo_t info;
00273 //   gSystem->GetProcInfo(&info);
00274 //   std::cout << "GET MEM INFO AT GetSmearedHisto START " << info.fMemResident << std::endl;
00275 // #endif
00276 
00277   TH1F **h = NULL;
00278   if(isMC) h = (smearEnergy) ? &category.smearHist_mc : &category.hist_mc;
00279   else h = (smearEnergy) ? &category.smearHist_data : &category.hist_data;
00280  
00281 #ifdef DEBUG
00282   if(h==NULL){
00283     std::cerr << "[ERROR] histogram pointer is NULL!!!" << std::endl;
00284     exit(1);
00285   }
00286   //std::cerr << "[DEBUG] isMC: " << isMC << "\tsmearEnergy: " << smearEnergy << std::endl;
00287 #endif
00288 
00289   // to be put as single if
00290   if(smearEnergy==false && (*h)->GetEntries() != 0) return *h;
00291   if(smearEnergy==true && isMC==false && (*h)->GetEntries() != 0) return *h;
00292 
00293   zee_events_t *cache = (isMC) ? category.mc_events : category.data_events;
00294 
00295   if(smearEnergy){
00296     
00297     //bool changed=isCategoryChanged(category);
00298     
00299     //if(changed || forceNew){ //else use the old smeared histo!
00300     (*h)->Reset();
00301     if(isMC && multiSmearToy){
00302       //std::cout << "[DEBUG] Smearing MC: " << category.categoryName1 << " " << category.categoryName2 << std::endl;
00303       SetSmearedHisto(*cache,
00304                       category.pars1, category.pars2, 
00305                       category.categoryName1, category.categoryName2, category.nSmearToy,
00306                       *h);
00307     } else {
00308       SetSmearedHisto(*cache,
00309                       category.pars1, category.pars2, 
00310                       category.categoryName1, category.categoryName2, 1,
00311                       *h);
00312     }
00313     if(isMC) (*h)->Scale(1./(*h)->Integral());
00314     //} //else  std::cout << "Not changed: " << category.categoryName1 << "\t" << category.categoryName2 << std::endl;
00315       
00316     (*h)->Smooth();
00317   } else{
00318     (*h)->Reset(); // unuseful: histogram should be empty
00319     SetHisto(*cache, *h);
00320   }
00321 
00322 //   if(isMC==false){
00323 //     delete cache;
00324 //   }
00325 // #ifdef MEM_DEBUG
00326 //   gSystem->GetProcInfo(&info);
00327 //   std::cout << "GET MEM INFO AT GetSmearedHisto END " << info.fMemResident << std::endl;
00328 // #endif
00329 
00330   return *h;
00331 }
00332 
00333 void RooSmearer::SetHisto(const zee_events_t& cache, TH1F *hist) const{
00334 #ifdef DEBUG
00335   hist->Print();
00336 #endif
00337   for(zee_events_t::const_iterator event_itr = cache.begin(); 
00338       event_itr!= cache.end();
00339       event_itr++){
00340     hist->Fill( event_itr->invMass, 
00341                 //sqrt(2 * event_itr->energy_ele1 * event_itr->energy_ele2 * event_itr->angle_eta_ele1_ele2),
00342                 event_itr->weight);
00343   }
00344 #ifdef DEBUG
00345   hist->Print();
00346 #endif
00347 
00348   return;
00349 }
00350 
00351 void RooSmearer::SetSmearedHisto(const zee_events_t& cache, 
00352                                  RooArgSet pars1, RooArgSet pars2, 
00353                                  TString categoryName1, TString categoryName2, unsigned int nSmearToy,
00354                                  TH1F *hist) const{
00355 #ifdef CPU_DEBUG
00356   //  myClock->Stop(); myClock->Start();
00357 #endif
00358 
00359   // retrieve values from params for the category
00360   float scale1 = pars1.getRealValue("scale_"+categoryName1, 0., kTRUE);
00361   float constant1 = pars1.getRealValue("constTerm_"+categoryName1, 0., kTRUE);
00362   float alpha1 = pars1.getRealValue("alpha_"+categoryName1, 0., kTRUE);
00363 
00364   float scale2 = pars2.getRealValue("scale_"+categoryName2, 0., kTRUE);
00365   float constant2 = pars2.getRealValue("constTerm_"+categoryName2, 0., kTRUE);
00366   float alpha2 = pars2.getRealValue("alpha_"+categoryName2, 0., kTRUE);
00367 
00368 #ifdef DEBUG
00369   pars1.writeToStream(std::cout, kFALSE);
00370   std::cout << "--" << std::endl;
00371   pars2.writeToStream(std::cout, kFALSE);
00372   //std::cout << "---" << std::endl;
00373   //_paramSet.writeToStream(std::cout, kFALSE);
00374 #endif
00375 //   if(nSmearToy>NSMEARTOYLIM){
00376 //     std::cerr << "[ERROR] nSmearToy = " << nSmearToy << std::endl;
00377 //     exit(1);
00378 //   }
00379 
00380   //double smearEne1[NSMEARTOYLIM], smearEne2[NSMEARTOYLIM]; // _nSmearToy<100
00381   double smearEne1[1000], smearEne2[1000]; // _nSmearToy<100
00382   if(cache.begin()->smearings_ele1==NULL){
00383     std::cerr<< "[ERROR] No smearings" << std::endl;
00384     exit(1);
00385   }
00386   for(zee_events_t::const_iterator event_itr = cache.begin(); 
00387           event_itr!= cache.end();
00388           event_itr++){
00389 
00390     //#ifdef FIXEDSMEARINGS
00391     smearedEnergy(smearEne1, nSmearToy, event_itr->energy_ele1, scale1, alpha1, constant1, event_itr->smearings_ele1);
00392     smearedEnergy(smearEne2, nSmearToy, event_itr->energy_ele2, scale2, alpha2, constant2, event_itr->smearings_ele2);
00393     //#else
00394     //  // random gen time is consuming!!! test different _nSmearToy to verify
00395     //    smearedEnergy(smearEne1, nSmearToy, event_itr->energy_ele1, scale1, alpha1, constant1,NULL);
00396     //    smearedEnergy(smearEne2, nSmearToy, event_itr->energy_ele2, scale2, alpha2, constant2,NULL);
00397     //#endif
00398 //     if(event_itr==cache.begin()){
00399 //       std::cout << "fixedSmearings: " << event_itr->smearings_ele1[0] << "\t"  << scale1 << "\t" << alpha1 << "\t" << event_itr->energy_ele1 << "\t" << constant1 << "\t" << smearEne1[0] << std::endl;
00400 //     }
00401     for(unsigned int iSmearToy=0; iSmearToy < nSmearToy; iSmearToy++){
00402       hist->Fill(event_itr->invMass * sqrt(smearEne1[iSmearToy] * smearEne2[iSmearToy]),
00403                  event_itr->weight);
00404     }
00405   }
00406   hist->Scale(1./nSmearToy);
00407   //  hist->Scale(1./hist->Integral()); // now saved as pdf
00408 
00409 #ifdef CPU_DEBUG
00410   //  myClock->Stop();
00411   //  std::cout << "nSmearToy: " << nSmearToy;      myClock->Print();
00412 #endif
00413   return;
00414 }
00415 
00416 
00417 
00418 double RooSmearer::smearedEnergy(double *smear, unsigned int nGen, float ene,float scale,float alpha,float constant, const float *fixedSmearings) const
00419 {
00420   // sigmaMB = sigma Material Budget
00421   // if I want to take into account the non perfet simulation of the
00422   // material budget in front of ECAL, I have to add in quadrature an
00423   // additional smearing term sigmaMB
00424 
00425   // float sigmaMB = sigmaMB(ene, eta, phi);
00426   // sigmaMB non dovrebbe essere una smooth function, ma tenere in
00427   // conto differenze consistenti in piccole regioni.
00428   //  float sigmaMB = MB * fabs{etaEle} * fabs{etaEle}
00429   //   float sigma = sqrt(alpha/sqrt(ene)*alpha/sqrt(ene) + constant * constant + sigmaMB*sigmaMB);
00430 
00431   float sigma = sqrt(alpha*alpha/ene + constant * constant );
00432 #ifdef FIXEDSMEARINGS
00433   for(unsigned int i=0; i < NSMEARTOYLIM && i<nGen; i++){
00434     smear[i] = (double) (fixedSmearings[i]*sigma)+(scale);
00435   }
00436   for(unsigned int i=NSMEARTOYLIM; i < nGen; i++){
00437     smear[i] = rgen_->Gaus(scale,sigma);
00438   }
00439 #else
00440   for(unsigned int i=0; i < nGen; i++){
00441         smear[i] = rgen_->Gaus(scale,sigma);
00442   }
00443 #endif
00444   return smear[0];
00445 }
00446 
00447 
00448 
00449 double RooSmearer::getLogLikelihood(TH1F* data, TH1F* prob) const
00450 {
00451   if (!data || !prob)
00452     {
00453       std::cout << "ERROR: empty histograms given" << std::endl;
00454       return -9999999.;
00455     }
00456   if (data->GetNbinsX() != prob->GetNbinsX())
00457     {
00458       std::cout << "ERROR: data and probabilities are binned differently" << std::endl;
00459       return -9999999.;
00460     }
00461   
00462 #ifdef FUNC_DEBUG
00463   //  std::cout << "Probability integral " << prob->Integral() << std::endl;
00464 #endif
00465   
00466   //   if (fabs(prob->Integral() -1 ) > 1e-4 )    
00467   //     {
00468   //       std::cout << "ERROR: probabilities are not properly normalized" << std::endl;
00469   //       return -9999999.;
00470   //     }
00471 
00472   double logL=0.;
00473   //Not using underflows and overflows at the moment
00474   for (int ibin=1;ibin<data->GetNbinsX()+1;++ibin)
00475     {
00476 #ifdef FUNC_DEBUG
00477       std::cout << "ibin " << ibin << "\tdata " << data->GetBinContent(ibin) << "\texpected " << prob->GetBinContent(ibin) << "\t MC " << prob->GetBinContent(ibin) * 514 << "\tlogL " << logL; //<< std::endl; 
00478       std::cout << std::fixed;
00479       std::cout << setprecision(10) << "\tdeltaLogL =  " << 
00480         data->GetBinContent(ibin)* ROOT::Math::Util::EvalLog(prob->GetBinContent(ibin)) + (data->Integral()-data->GetBinContent(ibin))*ROOT::Math::Util::EvalLog(1-prob->GetBinContent(ibin)) << "\t EvalLog = " << ROOT::Math::Util::EvalLog(prob->GetBinContent(ibin)) << std::endl;
00481       
00482 #endif
00483       
00484       if(prob->GetBinContent(ibin)!=0){
00485         
00486         double weight=  (data->GetBinContent(ibin)>0) ? data->GetBinError(ibin) * data->GetBinError(ibin) / data->GetBinContent(ibin) : 1;
00487         
00488         //      std::cout << "weight = " << weight << std::endl;
00489 #ifdef POISSON_LIKELIHOOD
00490         //Poisson likelihood 
00491         
00492         logL+=  weight * (data->GetBinContent(ibin)* ROOT::Math::Util::EvalLog(prob->GetBinContent(ibin)) - prob->GetBinContent(ibin));
00493 #else
00494         // Binomial likelihood
00495         logL+= weight * (data->GetBinContent(ibin)* ROOT::Math::Util::EvalLog(prob->GetBinContent(ibin)) + (data->Integral()-data->GetBinContent(ibin))*ROOT::Math::Util::EvalLog(1-prob->GetBinContent(ibin)));
00496 #endif
00497         } 
00498 #ifdef DEBUG
00499         else {
00500           std::cout << "MC ibin = 0: " 
00501                 << "ibin " << ibin << "\tdata " << data->GetBinContent(ibin) 
00502                 << "\texpected " << prob->GetBinContent(ibin) 
00503                 << "\tlogL " << logL
00504                 << "\tdeltaLogL =  " << 
00505                 data->GetBinContent(ibin)* ROOT::Math::Util::EvalLog(prob->GetBinContent(ibin)) + (data->Integral()-data->GetBinContent(ibin))*ROOT::Math::Util::EvalLog(1-prob->GetBinContent(ibin)) 
00506                 << "\t EvalLog = " << ROOT::Math::Util::EvalLog(prob->GetBinContent(ibin)) << std::endl;
00507         }
00508 #endif
00509   }
00510   //std::cout << "Finale logL = " << logL <<std::endl;
00511   return logL;
00512 }
00513 
00514 
00515 
00516 double RooSmearer::getCompatibility() const
00517 {
00518   RooSmearer* myClass=(RooSmearer *) this;
00519   // myClock->Start();
00520 
00521   std::vector<TH1F *> mcHistos, dataHistos;
00522 
00523   double compatibility = 0.;
00524   //------------------------------ fill the histograms 
00525 //   for(std::vector<ZeeCategory>::iterator cat_itr = myClass->ZeeCategories.begin();
00526 //       cat_itr != myClass->ZeeCategories.end();
00527 //       cat_itr++){
00528 //     if(!cat_itr->active) continue;
00529 //     if(isCategoryChanged(*cat_itr,false)){
00530 //      myClass->UpdateCategoryNLL(*cat_itr, cat_itr->nLLtoy,false); //the new nll has been updated for the category
00531 //     }
00532 //     compatibility+=cat_itr->nll;
00533 //     myClass->lastNLLrms+= (cat_itr->nllRMS*cat_itr->nllRMS);
00534 //   }
00535 
00536   //bool withSmearToy=(compatibility - nllMin < deltaNLLMaxSmearToy);
00537   //std::cout << "[DEBUG] Compatibility1: " << compatibility << "\t" << compatibility - nllMin << std::endl;
00538   //compatibility=0;
00539   bool updated=false;
00540   for(std::vector<ZeeCategory>::iterator cat_itr = myClass->ZeeCategories.begin();
00541       cat_itr != myClass->ZeeCategories.end();
00542       cat_itr++){
00543     if(!cat_itr->active) continue;
00544     if(isCategoryChanged(*cat_itr,true)){ // && withSmearToy){
00545       updated=true;
00546 #ifdef DEBUG
00547       std::cout << "[DEBUG] " << cat_itr->categoryName1 << " - " << cat_itr->categoryName2 << "\t isupdated" << std::endl;
00548 #endif
00549       myClass->UpdateCategoryNLL(*cat_itr, cat_itr->nLLtoy); //the new nll has been updated for the category
00550     }
00551     compatibility+=cat_itr->nll;
00552     myClass->lastNLLrms+= (cat_itr->nllRMS*cat_itr->nllRMS);
00553 #ifdef DEBUG
00554 
00555 #endif
00556     //    std::cout << std::fixed << std::setprecision(20) << "[DEBUG] Compatibility: " << compatibility << "\t" << compatibility-lastNLL << std::endl;
00557   }
00558   //if(withSmearToy) std::cout << "[DEBUG] Compatibility2: " << compatibility << "\t" << compatibility - nllMin << std::endl;
00559   if(dataset!=NULL && updated){
00560     myClass->nllVar.setVal(compatibility);
00561     myClass->dataset->add(RooArgSet(_paramSet,nllVar));
00562   }
00563 
00564   myClass->lastNLL=compatibility;
00565   myClass->lastNLLrms=sqrt(lastNLLrms);
00566   
00567   if(nllBase==0) myClass->nllBase=compatibility;
00568   else {
00569     if(nllMin> compatibility){
00570       //  std::cout << "[DEBUG] update nllMin: " << nllMin << " -> " << compatibility << std::endl;
00571       myClass->nllMin=compatibility;
00572     }
00573   }
00574 
00575   //  myClock->Stop();
00576   //  myClock->Print();
00577   return compatibility;
00578 }
00579 
00580 
00581 
00582 
00583 
00584 Double_t RooSmearer::evaluate() const
00585 {
00586 #ifdef CPU_DEBUG
00587   myClock->Start();
00588 #endif
00589 
00590 #ifdef MEM_DEBUG
00591   ProcInfo_t info;
00592   gSystem->GetProcInfo(&info);
00593   std::cout << "GET MEM INFO AT  EVALUATE START " << info.fMemResident << std::endl;
00594 #endif
00595 
00596   //update last result
00597   double comp_mean = getCompatibility();
00598 
00599 #ifdef CPU_DEBUG
00600   myClock->Stop();
00601   std::cout << "Elapsed time for eval: CPU " << myClock->CpuTime() << "; Real " <<  myClock->RealTime() << " s " << std::endl;
00602   //  myClock->Start();
00603 #endif
00604 
00605 #ifdef MEM_DEBUG
00606   gSystem->GetProcInfo(&info);
00607   std::cout << "GET MEM INFO JUST BEFORE END EVALUATE " << info.fMemResident << std::endl;
00608 #endif
00609 
00610   //#ifdef CPU_DEBUG
00611   //  myClock->Print();
00612   //#endif
00613 
00614   //_markov.AddFast(*((RooArgSet *)_params.Clone()), comp_mean, 1.);
00615   RooSmearer* myClass=(RooSmearer *) this;
00616   double weight=(nllBase*2-comp_mean);
00617   if(weight<0) weight=1;
00618   myClass->_markov.AddFast(myClass->_paramSet, comp_mean, weight);
00619 #ifdef CPU_DEBUG
00621   //  std::cout << "Elapsed time for add to MarkovChain: CPU " << myClock->CpuTime() << "; Real " <<  myClock->RealTime() << " s " << std::endl;
00622 #endif
00623 
00624   //_paramSet.writeToStream(std::cout, kFALSE);
00625   //  _paramSet.first()->Print();
00626   //  std::cout << "    " << comp_mean << std::endl;
00627   return comp_mean;
00628   //    return compatibility;
00629 }
00630 
00631 
00632 
00633 
00634 int RooSmearer::Trag_eq(int row, int col, int N) const
00635 {
00636   if (row <= col)
00637         return row*N - (row-1)*((row-1) + 1)/2 + col - row;
00638   else 
00639         return col*N - (col-1)*((col-1) + 1)/2 + row - col;
00640 }
00641 
00642 
00643 
00644 
00645 void RooSmearer::SetAutoBin(ZeeCategory& category,double min, double max){
00646   category.hist_mc->SetBins(1000,min,max);
00647   category.hist_mc->Reset();
00648   TH1F* wide = GetSmearedHisto(category,true/*bool isMC*/, false);
00649   Int_t nq = 100;
00650   double xq[100],yq[100];
00651   for (Int_t i=0;i<nq;i++) 
00652     xq[i] = (double)(i+1)/nq;
00653   wide->GetQuantiles(nq,yq,xq);
00654   
00655   //  category.invMass_min = yq[1];
00656   //  category.invMass_max = yq[95];
00657 
00658   // center the mean of the distribution
00659   float middle=0.5*(category.invMass_max+category.invMass_min);
00660   
00661   if(fabs(middle - wide->GetMean()) > 5){
00662     int shift = (int)(wide->GetMean() - middle);
00663     std::cout << "[INFO] Shifting invMass range of " << shift << std::endl;
00664     std::cout << "       invMass_min = " << category.invMass_min+shift << std::endl;
00665     std::cout << "       invMass_max = " << category.invMass_max+shift << std::endl;
00666     category.invMass_min+=shift;
00667     category.invMass_max+=shift;
00668   }
00669   ResetBinning(category);
00670 }
00671 
00672 void RooSmearer::ResetBinning(ZeeCategory& category){
00673   category.hist_mc->SetBins(category.nBins, category.invMass_min, category.invMass_max);
00674   category.hist_mc->Reset();
00675   category.smearHist_mc->SetBins(category.nBins, category.invMass_min, category.invMass_max);
00676   category.smearHist_mc->Reset();
00677 
00678   category.hist_data->SetBins(category.nBins, category.invMass_min, category.invMass_max);
00679   category.hist_data->Reset();
00680   if(category.smearHist_data!=NULL){
00681     category.smearHist_data->SetBins(category.nBins, category.invMass_min, category.invMass_max);
00682     category.smearHist_data->Reset();
00683   }
00684   return;
00685 }
00686 
00687 
00688 void RooSmearer::AutoNBins(ZeeCategory& category){
00689   if(!category.active) return;
00690   if(category.hist_mc->Integral()>30000){
00691     std::cout << "[INFO] Category: " << category.categoryName1 << " " << category.categoryName2 << "\t binning increased to: "  <<     category.nBins*2 << std::endl;
00692     category.nBins*=2;
00693     ResetBinning(category);
00694   }else   if(category.hist_mc->Integral()<5000){
00695     std::cout << "[INFO] Category: " << category.categoryName1 << " " << category.categoryName2 << "\t binning reduced to: "  <<     category.nBins/2 << std::endl;
00696     category.nBins/=2;
00697     ResetBinning(category);
00698   }
00699     
00700   return;
00701   //------------------------------ rescale mc histograms 
00702   
00703   //  (isCategoryChanged(category,true)); // && withSmearToy){
00704   category.scale1=1;
00705   TH1F *data = GetSmearedHisto(category, false, _isDataSmeared, true, false); 
00706   TH1F *mc = GetSmearedHisto(category, true, true,true); // regenerate the histogram: forceNew
00707   double chi2old=getLogLikelihood(data, mc);
00708   double min=chi2old; int nBin_min=0;
00709 
00710   std::cout << "[AUTOBIN] Starting scale1 sensitivity check: " << category.scale1 << "\t" <<std::fixed << std::setprecision(10) << chi2old << std::endl;
00711   double valueMin=category.scale1;
00712 
00713   for(int n=0; n<10; n++){
00714     double value=category.scale1-0.01+0.002*n;
00715     category.pars1.setRealValue("scale_"+category.categoryName1, value , kTRUE);
00716 
00717     ResetBinning(category);
00718     data = GetSmearedHisto(category, false, _isDataSmeared, true, false); 
00719     mc = GetSmearedHisto(category, true, true,true); // regenerate the histogram: forceNew
00720     double chi2=getLogLikelihood(data, mc);
00721     if(chi2 < min){
00722       min=chi2;
00723       valueMin=value;
00724     }
00725     std::cout << "[BINNING] scale1: " << value << "\t" << chi2-chi2old << "\t" << chi2-min << std::endl;
00726   }
00727   if(category.scale1!=valueMin){
00728     std::cout << "[WARNING] scale1 not closing: " << category.scale1 << "\t" << valueMin << std::endl;
00729   }
00730   return;
00731 
00732   category.nBins=nBin_min;
00733   ResetBinning(category);
00734   return;
00735 }
00736 
00737 void RooSmearer::AutoNSmear(ZeeCategory& category){
00738 
00739   
00740   if(!category.active) return;
00741   AutoNBins(category);
00742   return;
00743   //  category.nSmearToy=std::max(NSMEARTOYLIM*2,200);
00744   //Long64_t catSize=category.mc_events->size();
00745 //   if(catSize<3000){ 
00746 //     category.nBins=40;
00747 //     ResetBinning(category);
00748 //   } else if(catSize>40000){
00749 //     category.nBins=160;
00750 //     ResetBinning(category);
00751 //   }
00752   
00753 //   category.nSmearToy=(int)(300000./catSize); 
00754 //   if(category.nSmearToy <7) category.nSmearToy = 7; // fix the min to 3
00755 //   else  if( category.nSmearToy > 40) category.nSmearToy = 40; // fix the max to 20
00756   //  category.nSmearToy=NSMEARTOYLIM;
00757   if(!smearscan) return;
00758 
00759   //------------------------------ rescale mc histograms 
00760   double stdDev=10, stdDevLim=0.3;
00761   double min=10; //int nBin_min=0;
00762   int n=0;
00763   unsigned int nSmearToyLim=1000;
00764   category.nLLtoy=1;
00765   for(int iBin=160; iBin>120; iBin/=2){
00766     //category.nBins= iBin;
00767     //ResetBinning(category);
00768     //TH1F *data = GetSmearedHisto(category, false, _isDataSmeared, false, false); ///-----> not need to repeate!
00769     GetSmearedHisto(category, false, _isDataSmeared, false, false); 
00770 
00771     for(category.nLLtoy=1; category.nLLtoy < 2; category.nLLtoy+=2){
00772       for(; category.nSmearToy <= nSmearToyLim && stdDev> stdDevLim; category.nSmearToy*=2){
00773         double  sum=0, sum2=0;
00774         TStopwatch cl;
00775         cl.Start();
00776         for(n=0; n<50; n++){
00777           UpdateCategoryNLL(category, category.nLLtoy); //the new nll has been updated for the category
00778           
00779           sum+=category.nll;
00780           sum2+=category.nll * category.nll;
00781         }
00782         cl.Stop();
00783         sum/=n;
00784         sum2/=n;
00785         stdDev= sqrt(sum2 - sum*sum);
00786         if(stdDev/sum < min) {
00787           min=stdDev/sum; 
00788           //nBin_min=category.nBins;
00789         }
00790 
00791         
00792         std::cout << "[SMEARSCAN] " 
00793                   << "\t" << category.categoryIndex1
00794                   << " " << category.categoryIndex2
00795                   << "\t" << stdDev 
00796                   << "\t" << sum
00797                   << " " << stdDev/sum 
00798                   << "\t" << category.nSmearToy 
00799                   << " " << category.nLLtoy
00800                   << " " << category.nBins 
00801                   << "\tmcEvents=" << category.mc_events->size() 
00802                   << "\tdataEvents=" << category.data_events->size() 
00803                   << "\t" << cl.CpuTime()/50. << std::endl; 
00804         //<< std::endl;
00805       }
00806       //if(category.nSmearToy > nSmearToyLim) category.nSmearToy/=2;
00807       category.nSmearToy/=2;
00808     }
00809   }
00810   
00811   //  exit(0);
00812   return;
00813 #ifdef DD
00814   //============================================================
00815 
00816   AutoNBins(category);
00817   
00818   Long64_t catSize=category.mc_events->size();
00819   category.nSmearToy=(int)(std::max(1.,1000000./catSize));
00820   std::cout 
00821     << "\t" << category.categoryName1 << " " << category.categoryName2 
00822     << "\tnSmearToy=" << category.nSmearToy 
00823     << std::endl;
00824   return; 
00825 #ifndef DUMPHIST
00826   //  AutoNBins(category);
00827 #endif
00828   if(!category.active) return;
00829   TH1F *data = GetSmearedHisto(category, false, _isDataSmeared, false, false); 
00830 
00831 
00832   //------------------------------ rescale mc histograms 
00833   double stdDev=0, mean=0;
00834   int n=0;
00835 
00836 
00837   float nSmearToyLim=std::max(1.,100000./catSize);
00838   for(category.nLLtoy=1; category.nLLtoy <= 1; category.nLLtoy+=2){
00839       for(category.nSmearToy=1; category.nSmearToy <= nSmearToyLim; category.nSmearToy+=5){
00840 
00841     double  sum=0, sum2=0;
00842     for(n=0; n<500; n++){
00843       double comp=0, comp2=0.;
00844       for(unsigned int itoy=0; itoy < category.nLLtoy; itoy++){
00845         TH1F *mc = GetSmearedHisto(category, true, true,true); // regenerate the histogram: forceNew
00846 #ifdef DUMPHIST
00847         TString histName="tmp/hist3/";
00848         histName+=category.mc_events->size();
00849         histName+="-"; histName+=category.nSmearToy;
00850         histName+="-"; histName+=category.nLLtoy;
00851         histName+="-"; histName+=category.nBins;
00852         histName+="-"; histName+=n;
00853         histName+="-"; histName+=importer._constTermToy;
00854         histName+=".root";
00855         mc->SaveAs(histName);
00856 #endif   
00857         double c = getLogLikelihood(data, mc);
00858         comp+=c;
00859         comp2+=c*c;
00860       }
00861       comp/=category.nLLtoy;
00862       comp2/=category.nLLtoy;
00863       sum+=comp;
00864       sum2+=comp*comp;
00865     }
00866     
00867     mean=sum/n;
00868     stdDev= sqrt(sum2/n - mean*mean);
00869     std::cout << "[DEBUG] n = " << n 
00870               << "\t" << category.categoryIndex1
00871               << "\t" << category.categoryIndex2
00872               << "\t" << stdDev 
00873               << "\t" << mean 
00874               << "\t" << stdDev/mean 
00875               << "\t" << category.nSmearToy 
00876               << "\t" << category.nLLtoy
00877               << "\t" << category.nBins 
00878               << "\tmcEvents=" << category.mc_events->size() 
00879               << "\tdataEvents=" << category.data_events->size() 
00880               << std::endl;
00881       }
00882   }
00883 
00884 
00885   exit(0);
00886 
00887   do{
00888     category.nSmearToy+=5;
00889     double  sum=0, sum2=0;
00890     for(n=0; n<500; n++){
00891       TH1F *mc = GetSmearedHisto(category, true, true, true); // forceNew
00892       TH1F *h = (TH1F *) mc->Clone(TString(mc->GetName())+"_c");
00893       h->Scale(1./h->Integral()); // now the histogram is a pdf 
00894       double compatibility = fabs(getLogLikelihood(data, h ));
00895       sum+=compatibility;
00896       sum2+=compatibility *compatibility;
00897       stdDev=sum2/(n+1) - (sum/(n+1))* (sum/(n+1));
00898       //std::cout << "[DEBUG] n = " << n << "\t" << compatibility << "\t" << stdDev << "\t" << sum2/(n+1) << "\t" << sum/(n+1) << std::endl;
00899     delete h;
00900     }
00901     mean=sum/n;
00902     stdDev= sqrt(sum2/n - mean*mean);
00903     std::cout << "[DEBUG] n = " << n 
00904               << "\t" << stdDev 
00905               << "\t" << mean 
00906               << "\t" << stdDev/mean 
00907               << "\t" << category.nSmearToy 
00908               << "\t" << category.nBins 
00909               << "\tmcEvents=" << category.mc_events->size() 
00910               << "\tdataEvents=" << category.data_events->size() 
00911               << std::endl;
00912   } while (stdDev/mean>0.0005 && category.nSmearToy<2);
00913   std::cout << "[INFO] Category: " 
00914             << category.categoryIndex1 << " " << category.categoryIndex2 
00915     //<< "\t" << category.categoryName1 << " " << category.categoryName2 
00916             << "\tstdDev=" << stdDev << "\tnSmearToy="<< category.nSmearToy 
00917             << "\tmcEvents=" << category.mc_events->size() 
00918             << "\tdataEvents=" << category.data_events->size() 
00919             << std::endl;
00920 
00921   //TH1F *mc = GetSmearedHisto(category, true, true); // forceNew
00922   //  data->SaveAs("data.root");
00923   //mc->SaveAs("mc.root");
00924 #endif
00925   exit(0);
00926   return;
00927 }
00928 
00929 
00930 
00931 bool RooSmearer::isCategoryChanged(ZeeCategory& category, bool updateVar) const{
00932 #ifdef DEBUG
00933   std::cout << "[DEBUG] Checking if category changed: " << category.categoryName1 << "\t" << category.categoryName2 << std::endl;
00934 #endif
00935     bool changed=false;
00936 
00937     RooArgList argList1(category.pars1);
00938     RooArgList argList2(category.pars2);
00939 
00940     // checking if one of the variables has changed
00941     TIterator *it = argList1.createIterator();
00942     for(RooRealVar *v = (RooRealVar *) it->Next(); v!=NULL; v = (RooRealVar*) it->Next()){
00943       TString varName=v->GetName();
00944       double varValue=v->getVal();
00945       if(varName.Contains("scale") && varValue!= category.scale1){
00946         changed=true;
00947 #ifdef DEBUG
00948         std::cout << "scale changed for: " << category.categoryName1 << "\t" << category.scale1 << "\t" << varValue << "\t" << changed << "\t" << updateVar << std::endl;
00949 #endif
00950         if(updateVar) category.scale1=varValue;
00951       }
00952       if(varName.Contains("alpha")     && varValue!= category.alpha1){
00953         changed=true;
00954 #ifdef DEBUG
00955         std::cout << "alpha changed for: " << category.categoryName1 << "\t" << category.alpha1 << "\t" << varValue << "\t" << changed << std::endl;
00956 #endif
00957         if(updateVar) category.alpha1=varValue;
00958       }
00959       if(varName.Contains("constTerm") && varValue!= category.constant1){
00960         changed=true;
00961 #ifdef DEBUG
00962         std::cout << "alpha changed for: " << category.categoryName1 << "\t" << category.constant1 << "\t" << varValue << "\t" << changed << std::endl;
00963 #endif
00964         if(updateVar) category.constant1 = varValue;
00965       }
00966     }
00967 
00968     delete it;
00969     it = argList2.createIterator();
00970     for(RooRealVar *v = (RooRealVar *) it->Next(); v!=NULL; v = (RooRealVar*) it->Next()){
00971       TString varName=v->GetName();
00972       double varValue=v->getVal();
00973 
00974       if(varName.Contains("scale")     && varValue!= category.scale2){
00975         changed=true;
00976         if(updateVar) category.scale2=varValue;
00977       }
00978       if(varName.Contains("alpha")     && varValue!= category.alpha2){
00979         changed=true;
00980         if(updateVar) category.alpha2=varValue;
00981       }
00982       if(varName.Contains("constTerm") && varValue!= category.constant2){
00983         changed=true;
00984         if(updateVar) category.constant2 = varValue;
00985       }
00986     }
00987     
00988     delete it;
00989     return changed;
00990 }      
00991 
00992 
00993 void RooSmearer::SetNSmear(unsigned int n_smear, unsigned int nlltoy){
00994 
00995   for(std::vector<ZeeCategory>::iterator cat_itr = ZeeCategories.begin();
00996       cat_itr != ZeeCategories.end();
00997       cat_itr++){
00998     if(n_smear>0) cat_itr->nSmearToy=n_smear;
00999     if(nlltoy >0) cat_itr->nLLtoy=nlltoy;
01000   }
01001   return;
01002 }
01003 
01004 
01005 void RooSmearer::Init(TString commonCut, TString eleID, Long64_t nEvents, bool mcToy, bool externToy, TString initFile){
01006   if(mcToy) _isDataSmeared=!externToy; //mcToy;
01007   if(initFile.Sizeof()>1){
01008     std::cout << "[INFO] Truth values for toys initialized to " << std::endl;
01009     //truthSet->readFromFile(initFile);
01010     //truthSet->writeToStream(std::cout, kFALSE);
01011     std::cout << "------------------------------ Read init toy MC:" << std::endl;
01012     _paramSet.readFromFile(initFile);
01013     _paramSet.writeToStream(std::cout, kFALSE);
01014   }
01015   SetCommonCut(commonCut); SetEleID(eleID);
01016   SetCache(nEvents, mcToy, externToy); InitCategories(mcToy);
01017   TStopwatch cl;
01018   cl.Start();
01019   evaluate();
01020   cl.Stop();
01021   std::cout << "[INFO] Time for first eval: ";
01022   cl.Print();
01023   if(mcToy && false){
01024     RooArgList argList(_paramSet);
01025     TIterator *it = argList.createIterator();
01026     for(RooRealVar *var = (RooRealVar *) it->Next(); var!=NULL; var =  (RooRealVar *)it->Next()){
01027       var->randomize();
01028     }
01029     std::cout << "------------------------------ Randomize initial value:" << std::endl;
01030     _paramSet.writeToStream(std::cout, kFALSE);
01031   }
01032   return;
01033 }
01034 
01035 void RooSmearer::UpdateCategoryNLL(ZeeCategory& cat, unsigned int nLLtoy, bool multiSmearToy){
01036   TH1F *data = GetSmearedHisto(cat, false, _isDataSmeared,true, false); 
01037       
01038   double comp=0., comp2=0.;
01039   for(unsigned int itoy=0; itoy < nLLtoy; itoy++){
01040     TH1F *mc = GetSmearedHisto(cat, true, true,true,true); // regenerate the histogram: forceNew
01041     
01042     double c = getLogLikelihood(data, mc);
01043     comp+=c;
01044     comp2+=c*c;
01045   }
01046   comp/=nLLtoy;
01047   comp2/=nLLtoy;
01048 //   std::cout << std::fixed << setprecision(10) << cat.categoryName1 << "  " << cat.categoryName2 
01049 //          << "\t nll - comp = " << cat.nll +comp << std::endl;
01050   cat.nll= -comp;
01051   cat.nllRMS= sqrt(comp2-comp*comp);
01052   return;
01053 }
01054 
01055 void RooSmearer::DumpNLL(void) const{
01056   for(std::vector<ZeeCategory>::const_iterator cat_itr = ZeeCategories.begin();
01057       cat_itr != ZeeCategories.end();
01058       cat_itr++){
01059     if(!cat_itr->active)
01060       std::cout << "[DUMP NLL] " << std::setprecision(10) << cat_itr->categoryIndex1 << " " << cat_itr->categoryIndex2 << "\t" << cat_itr->nll << "\t" << cat_itr->mc_events->size() << "\t" << cat_itr->data_events->size() << "\t1" << std::endl;
01061     else 
01062       std::cout << "[DUMP NLL] " << std::setprecision(10) << cat_itr->categoryIndex1 << " " << cat_itr->categoryIndex2 << "\t" << cat_itr->nll << "\t" << cat_itr->mc_events->size() << "\t" << cat_itr->data_events->size() << "\t0" << std::endl;
01063   }
01064   return;
01065 }
